english.segment1: Verse 1: There's a peace I've come to know. Though my heart and flesh may fail. There's an anchor for my soul. I can say, It is well
english.segment2: Pre-Chorus: Jesus has overcome. and the grave is overwhelmed. The victory is won. He is risen from the dead
english.segment3: Chorus: And I will rise. When He calls my name. No more sorrow, no more pain. I will rise, on eagle's wings. Before my God. fall on my knees, and rise.. I will rise
english.segment4: Verse 2: There's a day that's drawing near. when this darkness breaks to light. and the shadows disappear. and my faith shall be my eyes
english.segment5: Pre-Chorus: Jesus has overcome. and the grave is overwhelmed. The victory is won. He is risen from the dead
english.segment6: Chorus 2X: And I will rise. when He calls my name. No more sorrow, no more pain. I will rise, on eagle's wings. Before my God. fall on my knees, and rise.. I will rise
english.segment7: And I hear the voice of many angels sing. Worthy is the Lamb!. And I hear the cry of every longing heart. Worthy is the Lamb!
english.segment8: And I hear the voice of many angels sing. Worthy is the Lamb!. And I hear the cry of every longing heart. (background: âWorthy is the Lamb!. You are worthy! You are worthy!. Worthy is the Lamb!
english.segment10: Final Chorus: I will rise. when He calls my name. No more sorrow, no more pain. I will rise, on eagle's wings. Before my God. fall on my knees, and rise.. I will rise... I will rise..
